title: Social Media Image Pack
description: Create consistent social media visuals with AI. Generate Instagram posts, stories, YouTube thumbnails, and complete brand packages that stop the scroll.
prompt:
You are a social media visual strategist who creates viral-worthy content that maintains brand consistency across all platforms. You understand platform-specific requirements and psychological triggers that make people stop scrolling.

I need a complete social media visual package that looks professional and drives engagement.

BRAND FOUNDATION:
- Brand Name: [Your brand]
- Industry/Niche: [Fashion / Fitness / Food / Tech / Beauty / Education / Other]
- Target Audience: [Age range, interests, platform preferences]
- Brand Personality: [Fun / Professional / Luxe / Minimal / Bold / Natural]
- Color Palette: [Primary: #hex, Secondary: #hex, Accent: #hex]
- Visual Style: [Photo-realistic / Illustration / 3D / Flat design / Mixed media]
- Competitors: [For style reference]

COMPLETE SOCIAL MEDIA PACKAGE:

1. **INSTAGRAM FEED POST (1:1)**
"[Brand topic] social media post, Instagram aesthetic, [brand colors], bold typography saying '[your text]', [visual style], engaging composition, professional design, trending on Instagram --ar 1:1 --v 5.2"

2. **INSTAGRAM STORY (9:16)**
"Instagram story design for [brand], vertical format, [main element], space for text overlay at top and bottom, [brand colors], swipe-up area at bottom, mobile-optimized, [visual style] --ar 9:16 --v 5.2"

3. **INSTAGRAM CAROUSEL COVER**
"Instagram carousel cover slide, '[Title Text]' in bold letters, numbered 1 of [X], [brand colors], consistent design system, swipe indicator, [visual style], professional layout --ar 1:1 --v 5.2"

4. **YOUTUBE THUMBNAIL (16:9)**
"YouTube thumbnail for '[Video Title]', eye-catching design, [main subject] with shocked/excited expression, bold text overlay, high contrast, [brand colors], clickable design, professional YouTube thumbnail --ar 16:9 --v 5.2"

5. **TIKTOK COVER (9:16)**
"TikTok video cover, '[Hook Text]' in trendy font, [visual element], Gen-Z aesthetic, [brand colors], mobile-first design, viral potential, vertical format --ar 9:16 --v 5.2"

6. **LINKEDIN POST (1200x627)**
"Professional LinkedIn post graphic, [topic], corporate but engaging, [brand colors], space for text, business aesthetic, thought leadership design, clean layout --ar 1200:627 --v 5.2"

7. **TWITTER/X HEADER (1500x500)**
"Twitter header banner for [brand], [visual theme], space for profile circle on left, [brand colors], professional header design, consistent branding --ar 3:1 --v 5.2"

8. **PINTEREST PIN (2:3)**
"Pinterest pin for [topic], vertical infographic style, '[Title]' at top, [visual elements], step-by-step layout, [brand colors], save-worthy design, Pinterest-optimized --ar 2:3 --v 5.2"

CONTENT TYPES BY PURPOSE:

**Quote Posts:**
"'[Your quote]' in [font style], [background style], [brand colors], Instagram quote post, inspiring design, shareable content, professional typography --ar 1:1"

**Before/After:**
"Split screen before and after, [subject], dramatic transformation, clear division, labeled sections, [brand colors], compelling comparison --ar 1:1"

**Tips/Education:**
"[Number] tips for [topic], numbered list design, icons for each point, [brand colors], educational infographic, easy to read, valuable content --ar 1:1"

**Product Feature:**
"[Product] feature spotlight, highlighting [specific feature], arrows and callouts, [brand colors], educational product post, clear benefits --ar 1:1"

**Testimonial:**
"Customer testimonial design, five stars, quote marks, '[testimonial text]', customer photo placeholder, [brand colors], trust-building design --ar 1:1"

**Event/Announcement:**
"[Event type] announcement, date and time prominent, [visual theme], excitement-building design, [brand colors], clear CTA, professional layout --ar 1:1"

CONSISTENT STORY TEMPLATES:

**Poll/Question:**
"Instagram story poll template, '[Question]', this or that format, [brand colors], interactive design, engagement-driving, clear options --ar 9:16"

**Countdown:**
"Story countdown template, '[Event]' launching soon, timer placeholder, excitement building, [brand colors], urgency design --ar 9:16"

**Behind the Scenes:**
"BTS story template, 'Behind the Scenes' text, casual authentic feel, [brand colors], exclusive content vibe, mobile-optimized --ar 9:16"

**Swipe Up/Link:**
"Story with link sticker area, '[CTA text]', arrow pointing up, [brand colors], action-driving design, clear call-to-action --ar 9:16"

BRAND CONSISTENCY ELEMENTS:

Logo Placement:
"subtle [brand] logo in bottom right corner, watermark style, consistent across all posts"

Font Hierarchy:
"headline in [font1], body text in [font2], consistent typography system, readable on mobile"

Color Usage:
"primary color for headlines, secondary for accents, white space for breathing room, consistent palette"

Filter/Style:
"consistent filter effect, [warm/cool/neutral] tone, signature look, recognizable style"

ENGAGEMENT BOOSTERS:

Carousel Prompts:
"Slide [number] of [total], consistent design across slides, swipe indicator, continuous story, [brand style]"

Video Thumbnails:
"play button overlay, motion blur suggesting action, intriguing frame, clickbait-worthy but honest"

Story Highlights:
"Instagram highlight cover icons, [category name], minimalist design, [brand colors], consistent set of [number] --ar 1:1"

Reel Covers:
"Instagram Reel cover, trending audio reference, bold text hook, [brand style], vertical video thumbnail --ar 9:16"

SEASONAL VARIATIONS:

"[Holiday/Season] themed post, [regular content] with seasonal elements, maintaining brand colors, festive but on-brand, timely content --ar 1:1"

PLATFORM-SPECIFIC OPTIMIZATION:

- Instagram: High contrast, mobile-first, square or vertical
- TikTok: Fast-paced feel, Gen-Z aesthetic, vertical only
- YouTube: Clear thumbnails, readable at small size
- LinkedIn: Professional, text-friendly, landscape
- Pinterest: Vertical, informational, save-worthy
- Twitter: Works in feed, considers crop, simple

Remember: Consistency builds recognition. Save templates and reuse with variations!
